account_expired.description_1: You have exceeded the 30-day trial of the Care receiver application.
account_expired.description_2: Please contact the app admin via email to activate your account & continue its use.
account_expired.title: Account expired

account_suspended.description_1: Your account has been suspended. You will not have access to the functionalities anymore of the Care Receiver application.
account_suspended.description_2: Please contact the app administrator via email if you believe this is an error.
account_suspended.title: Account suspended

battery_check.alert: Please connect the tablet power supply to ensure continuous operation of the application

call_error.no_audio_and_camera_permission: The app does not have permission to access audio and camera.
call_error.no_audio_permission: The app does not have permission to access audio.
call_error.title: The call cannot be completed

expiring_soon.description_1: Your account trial period will end in {{accountExpiresIn}} days. You will soon no longer have access to the features of the Care Receiver application
expiring_soon.description_2: Please contact the app admin via email to activate your account & continue its use.
expiring_soon.title: The access period is coming to an end

settings.automatic_pickup_description: The incoming call will be answered automatically after 3 seconds
settings.discharge_alert_description: When the tablet is unplugged, the Care receiver will receive an alert to reconnect it.
settings.min_volume_description: The volume will stay activated and will be set at 50% minimum

contacts.subtitle: Touch the contact’s name to begin chatting
contacts.title: My contacts

screen.forget_password: Please inform your email address to reveive the password reset request

login.no_account: You don’t have an account yet?

screen.password_reset_confirmed: Your password reset request has been taken into account. If your account already exist, an email will soon be sent.

register.duplicate_email_error: There is already an account linked to this email
register.invalid_email_error: Please inform a valid email address
register.invalid_phone_number_error: Please inform a valid phone number
register.missing_firstname_lastname_error: Please enter your last and first name
register.name_title: Enter your first and last name
register.phone_title: Please enter your phone number, your country, and the sponsor code (optional).

reminders_list.go_back_instruction: Touch the screen to go back to the home screen

screen.reset_password_confirmed: Your password reset request has been taken into account.

reset_password.invalid_request: Invalid password reset request (used or expired). Please make another request.
reset_password.title: Please enter your new password

solar.nighttime_description:
<0>It is <2><0>{{hour}}</0></2><3>
 </3> Sleep is necessary for your brain to fix your body.</0>
